# Random Story
Once upon a time there was a **really** sad duck. He was sad because he wasn't exactly *thin* and  was ashamed to be around others. Finally winter came, and when it did all the other ducks got cold and unhappy, all except him who managed to stay warm preciselly because he was *thin*. He was happy
because something that would have made other laugh about him in the past, now make them **jealous**. 

But instead of laughing  back at the others (like *you* and *me* would surely have done...) he told them this :

![DUCK](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwjs6NvZlLXdAhUEMqwKHbdgCVIQjRx6BAgBEAU&url=http%3A%2F%2Fsimpsons.wikia.com%2Fwiki%2FHa_Ha!&psig=AOvVaw2T1DQhe2zoHls-DROKiXYY&ust=1536831253770412
It was a fake laugh.
"What a wonderful duck" said *Gandalf*
